theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Reproduction-Maintenance Energy Trade-off Disposable Soma Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Classic disposable soma concept focusing on energy allocation trade-offs between reproduction and somatic maintenance leading to aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Reproduction-Maintenance Energy Trade-off Disposable Soma Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Emphasizes resource allocation trade-offs between reproduction and somatic maintenance causing senescence.

theory_assignments.reasoning: Kirkwood's formulation of disposable soma theory focusing on resource allocation between reproduction and maintenance.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Reproduction-Maintenance Energy Trade-off Disposable Soma Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Discusses resource allocation trade-offs and evolutionary basis of aging with emphasis on reproduction vs maintenance.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Reproduction-Maintenance Energy Trade-off Disposable Soma Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on resource allocation favoring germ line over soma, consistent with disposable soma energy trade-offs.

theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes optimal resource allocation between somatic maintenance and reproduction affecting aging.

theory_assignments.reasoning: Explores trade-offs between early reproductive investment and somatic maintenance influencing aging rates.

theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on somatic damage accumulation due to resource allocation trade-offs between reproduction and maintenance.

theory_assignments.reasoning: Energy allocation trade-offs between reproduction and somatic maintenance influencing senescence.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Reproduction-Maintenance Energy Trade-off Disposable Soma Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Human longevity trade-offs between somatic maintenance and reproduction, consistent with disposable soma energy allocation.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Reproduction-Maintenance Energy Trade-off Disposable Soma Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes adaptive resource reallocation from reproduction to maintenance under dietary restriction, fitting energy trade-off.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Reproduction-Maintenance Energy Trade-off Disposable Soma Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Energy allocation trade-offs and evolutionary inevitability of aging due to limited somatic maintenance investment.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Reproduction-Maintenance Energy Trade-off Disposable Soma Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Trade-offs between somatic maintenance and reproduction shaped by extrinsic mortality influencing aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Reproduction-Maintenance Energy Trade-off Disposable Soma Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Energy allocation trade-offs and reproduction-induced somatic damage accelerating aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Reproduction-Maintenance Energy Trade-off Disposable Soma Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Resource allocation trade-offs affecting somatic maintenance and lifespan differences, including telomere maintenance.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Reproduction-Maintenance Energy Trade-off Disposable Soma Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Metabolic energy allocation between reproduction and somatic maintenance, with DNA repair investment influencing lifespan.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Reproduction-Maintenance Energy Trade-off Disposable Soma Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Somatic maintenance investment tuned by environmental mortality risk, consistent with energy allocation trade-offs.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Reproduction-Maintenance Energy Trade-off Disposable Soma Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Genetic variation in resource acquisition and allocation affecting life-history traits including reproduction and maintenance.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Energetic Growth-Maintenance Trade-off Disposable Soma Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on metabolic energy partitioning between growth and health maintenance, linking growth rate to damage accumulation.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Calorie Restriction and Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling Disposable Soma Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Calorie restriction extends lifespan via suppression of IGF/insulin signaling and activation of sirtuins, linking nutrient sensing to aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Calorie Restriction and Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling Disposable Soma Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Reduction of insulin/IGF-1 signaling extends lifespan and mediates effects of calorie restriction on aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Calorie Restriction and Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling Disposable Soma Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Calorie restriction modulates insulin/IGF-1 signaling improving metabolic health and oxidative stress resistance.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Calorie Restriction and Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling Disposable Soma Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: IIS pathway regulates nutrient sensing and longevity; reduced IIS activity linked to lifespan extension.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Calorie Restriction and Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling Disposable Soma Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Insulin/IGF-1 signaling is a conserved metabolic pathway regulating lifespan and interacting with caloric restriction.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Calorie Restriction and Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling Disposable Soma Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Calorie restriction reduces metabolic rate and oxidative stress, extending lifespan and improving healthspan.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Calorie Restriction and Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling Disposable Soma Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: IIS-mediated mitochondrial metabolic tuning promotes longevity, linking insulin signaling to mitochondrial function.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Calorie Restriction and Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling Disposable Soma Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: IIS regulates reproductive aging via oocyte-specific targets, linking insulin signaling to fertility and aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Reproduction-Linked Programmed Somatic Maintenance Decline Disposable Soma Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Programmed repression of stress responses at reproduction onset reflects resource allocation shift favoring reproduction over somatic maintenance.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Germline DNA Damage-Induced Systemic Stress Resistance Disposable Soma Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Germline DNA damage triggers systemic somatic stress resistance, adjusting somatic maintenance to reproductive genome stability.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Reproductive-Cell Cycle Signaling Disposable Soma Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Reproductive hormones modulate cell cycle signaling affecting aging rate via antagonistic pleiotropy.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Reproductive-Cell Cycle Signaling Disposable Soma Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Endocrine dyscrasia and reproductive hormone-driven cell cycle dysregulation cause aging phenotypes.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Ontogenesis-Driven Resource Redistribution Disposable Soma Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Resource shift from housekeeping to integrative genes during ontogenesis reduces repair capacity, causing aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Reproductive Aging as Biomarker Disposable Soma Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Reproductive system aging and hormonal changes serve as biomarkers reflecting organismal aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Reproductive Senescence and Maternal Investment Disposable Soma Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on fertility and maternal-effect senescence impacting reproductive aging and offspring survival.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Cognitive Resource Depletion Theory (Non-Disposable Soma)
theory_assignments.reasoning: Theory on cognitive resource depletion during sustained attention, mechanistically distinct from disposable soma energy trade-offs.
